00030 const Matrix IMUFilter::buildA()
00031 {
00032         //Build System Matrix
00033         Matrix A(constants::IMU_STATE_SIZE(),constants::IMU_STATE_SIZE());
00034         A = 0;
00035         for (int r = 1; r <= constants::ODOM_STATE_SIZE(); ++r)
00036         {
00037                 A(r,r) = 1;
00038         }
00039 
00040         return A;
00041 }
